name: Sea Battle: Through the Ages
description:
Two fleets meet in the deadly naval fight. The game will take you to the different epochs, you will take part in epic battle of ancient greek fleet, you will face ships of the Golden Age of Piracy, and finally you will combat against modernly equipped naval fleet. Use your own tactics, work out schemes and manoeuvres, use different types of weapon, to sink your enemy and win the battle!Key features:
  • 3 Different epochs: ancient, post-medieval, modern
  • 2 Modes of Playing: PLAYER vs PLAYER, PLAYER vs AI
  • Achievements & In-Game Bonuses for more dynamic fight
